lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Pending regulatory approval, the CBT plans to offer evening trading in the world's most active futures contract, Treasury bonds, along with Treasury note futures and options on those contracts.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Some credit market analysts, including Norman Quinn, president of Golden Gate Futures, said the night session would likely be dominated by institutions, because the larger local traders would refuse to return at night.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The evening session will make available to traders in the Far East interest rate hedging vehicles when their day is just beginning, and the CBT hopes to attract trading capital from the Pacific Rim's burgeoning financial centers.
